title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 871.1 - Class I projects
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 871.1 - Class I projects

State Regulations

Projects described in subdivisions (a) and (b) of this
section shall be subject to review by the commission under standards provided
by this Part and in accordance with the provisions of Part 872 of this Title, as follows: (a) All projects subject to
review by the commission under section
3.8
of the Compact and the
regulations thereunder. (b) State
and local standards of flood plain regulation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
871.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
